arStrings.szText:
You and Varyana stack {c_important}Massacre{/c} together on kills. Certain stack thresholds grant Movement Speed:

  {c_number}[10]{/c} Stacks : {c_number}[5|+%|]{/c} Movement Speed
  {c_number}[25]{/c} Stacks : {c_number}[10|+%|]{/c} Movement Speed
  {c_number}[50]{/c} Stacks : {c_number}[15|+%|]{/c} Movement Speed
  {c_number}[100]{/c} Stacks  : {c_number}[20|+%|]{/c} Movement Speed

{c_important}Massacre{/c} resets after {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds of not killing an enemy.
